task.title: Changing the state of an XA transaction branch by using REST Administration APIs
task.shortdesc: System administrators can commit an XA transaction branch that is in prepared state by using REST Administration APIs. System administrators can roll an XA transaction branch back that is in prepared state. System administrators can forget an XA transaction branch that is in a heuristically complete state.
